wikipedia_page.main: Maurice Alexander,  (24 December 1889 – 16 July 1945) was a Canadian barrister and soldier who later moved to England and had careers in the Diplomatic Service, English law and politics.

link_mentions.page: List of United Kingdom MPs: A

response: * Maurice Alexander (BA 1908; BCL 1910) – Liberal Member of the House of Commons in the British Parliament for Southwark South East, UK

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1922 United Kingdom general election

response: * Lieutenant Colonel Maurice Alexander, CMG, KC - Famous Canadian Lawyer, Judge Advocate General and highest ranking Jewish Officer in the CEF.

response: *Lt-Col Maurice Alexander (National Liberal, Southwark South East)
